## Description {#details}

Platforms set up standard symbols and mediate interactions between dynamic initializers (e.g.

C++ static constructors) and <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executionsession">ExecutionSession</a> state. Note that Platforms do not automatically run initializers: clients are still responsible for doing this.

Definition at line 1273 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h">Core.h</a>.

### setupJITDylib() {#af83795e97281d33db2882a003b2c7545}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>virtual Error llvm::orc::Platform::setupJITDylib (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &amp; JD)</>}>
This method will be called outside the session lock each time a <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> is created (unless it is created with EmptyJITDylib set) to allow the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/platform">Platform</a> to install any <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> specific standard symbols (e.g &#95;&#95;dso&#95;handle).

## Public Static Functions

### lookupInitSymbols() {#aded9cbc2f7fa64fbbdf4f5ce8f826dd5}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype={<>Expected&lt; DenseMap&lt; JITDylib &#42;, SymbolMap &gt; &gt; llvm::orc::Platform::lookupInitSymbols (<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/executionsession">ExecutionSession</a> &amp; ES, <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/aarch64/aarch64promoteconstant-cpp/#a90f8350fecae261c25be85d38b451bff">const</a> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/densemap">DenseMap</a>&lt; <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/jitdylib">JITDylib</a> &#42;, <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/orc/symbollookupset">SymbolLookupSet</a> &gt; &amp; InitSyms)</>}
  labels = {["static"]}>
A utility function for looking up initializer symbols.

Performs a blocking lookup for the given symbols in each of the given JITDylibs.

Note: This function is deprecated and will be removed in the near future.

Declaration at line <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h/#l01301">1301</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/executionengine/include/llvm/executionengine/orc/core-h">Core.h</a>, definition at line <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/core-cpp/#l01494">1494</a> of file <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/executionengine/lib/executionengine/orc/core-cpp">Core.cpp</a>.
</MemberDefinition>
